readership.translation[0].definitions[0]: all the people who read a particular newspaper or magazine regularly
They are hoping that the paper will have quite a wide readership.
a magazine with a readership of 60,000
readership.translation[0].definitions[1]: the job that a Reader has in a British university
readership.translation[1].definitions[0]: the people who read a particular newspaper or magazine
The magazine has a largely male readership.
